description: A BreaklineRelief represents a terrain component with 3D lines. These lines denote break lines or ridge/valley lines.

properties.name: ridgeOrValleyLines
properties.description: Relates to the 3D MultiCurve geometry of the ridge or valley lines of the BreaklineRelief.

properties.name: breaklines
properties.description: Relates to the 3D MultiCurve geometry of the break lines of the BreaklineRelief.
